metadata.title: CVE-2024-42099 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/dasd: Fix invalid dereferencing of indirect CCW data pointerFix invalid dereferencing of indirect CCW data pointer indasd_eckd_dump_sense() that leads to a kernel panic in error cases.When using indirect addressing for DASD CCWs (IDAW) the CCW CDA pointerdoes not contain the data address itself but a pointer to the IDAL.This needs to be translated from physical to virtual as well beforeusing it.This dereferencing is also used for dasd_page_cache and also fixedalthough it is very unlikely that this code path ever gets used.
